trendingPosts.title_excerpt: Today: @Amazon just committed $50B to @OpenAI. $15B upfront. $35B to follow. Part of a $110B funding round valuing OpenAI at $730B.

trendingPosts.title_excerpt: Latest: SEC Chair Paul Atkins called crypto regulation under Gary Gensler a 'big missed opportunity for the United States', and says the agency is now racing to make up for lost time.
trendingPosts.trend_note: Regulatory policy shift under new SEC leadership - major implications for crypto industry

trendingPosts.title_excerpt: Analysis: $BTC funding rates just dropped to -6%, matching the most negative level in 3 months, a sign traders are aggressively shorting. Last time rates were this negative was Feb. 6, when Bitcoin bottomed near $60,000.
trendingPosts.trend_note: Critical sentiment indicator - negative funding rates suggest potential bottom formation near $60K
trendingPosts.author: @CoinDesk

trendingPosts.title_excerpt: Markets: U.S. spot Bitcoin ETFs are on track for their biggest week in 6, pulling in $1.1B in net inflows over three straight days with BlackRock's $IBIT accounting for more than half, per @SoSoValue.
